bridge-type.label: Automower Connect Bridge
bridge-type.description: The bridge to communicate with the Automower Connect API

parameter.name: appKey
parameter.label: Application Key
parameter.description: The Application Key is required to communicate with the Automower Connect API at https://developer.husqvarnagroup.cloud/. It can be obtained by registering an Application on the Husqvarna Website. This application also needs to be connected to the "Authentication API" and the "Automower Connect API"

parameter.name: appSecret
parameter.label: Application Secret
parameter.description: The Application Secret is required to communicate with the Automower Connect API at https://developer.husqvarnagroup.cloud/. It can be obtained by registering an Application on the Husqvarna Website.

parameter.name: pollingInterval
parameter.label: Polling Interval
parameter.description: How often the available automowers should be queried in seconds

parameter.name: mowerId
parameter.label: Automower Id
parameter.description: The Id of an automower as used by the Automower Connect Api to identify a mower

parameter.name: pollingInterval
parameter.label: Polling Interval
parameter.description: How often the current automower state should be polled in seconds

parameter.name: mowerZoneId
parameter.label: TimeZone
parameter.description: Time zone of the mower (e.g. Europe/Berlin)

channel-type.label: Automower Name
channel-type.description: The channel providing the automower name

channel-type.label: Mode
channel-type.description: The current mode

channel-type.label: Activity
channel-type.description: The current activity

channel-type.label: Inactive Reason
channel-type.description: The current reason for being inactive

options.option: The mower is planning a path or a work area
Waiting for fix when using EPOS

channel-type.label: State
channel-type.description: The current state

channel-type.label: Work Area Id
channel-type.description: Id of the active work area

channel-type.label: Work Area Name
channel-type.description: Name of the active work area

channel-type.label: Last Update
channel-type.description: The time when the mower sent the last update

channel-type.label: Last Poll Update
channel-type.description: The time when the binding polled the last update from the cloud

channel-type.label: Poll Update
channel-type.description: Poll mower status update from the cloud

channel-type.label: Battery
channel-type.description: The battery level of the mower at the time of last update

channel-type.label: Error Code
channel-type.description: The error code at the time of last update

channel-type.label: Error Message
channel-type.description: The error message at the time of last update

channel-type.label: Error Time
channel-type.description: The time when the error occurred

channel-type.label: Error Confirmable
channel-type.description: If the mower has an Error Code this attribute states if the error is confirmable

channel-type.label: Next Auto Start
channel-type.description: The channel providing the time for the next auto start. If the mower is charging then the value is the estimated time when it will be leaving the charging station. If the mower is about to start now, the value is NULL.

channel-type.label: Override Action
channel-type.description: The channel providing an action that overrides current planner operation.

channel-type.label: Restricted Reason
channel-type.description: The channel providing a reason that restrics current planner operation.

channel-type.label: External Reason
channel-type.description: The channel providing an external reason that restrics current planner operation.

channel-type.label: Cutting Height
channel-type.description: Prescaled cutting height, range: 1-9

channel-type.label: Headlight Mode
channel-type.description: Information about headlights

channel-type.label: Cutting Blade Usage Time
channel-type.description: The time since the last reset of the cutting blade usage counter

channel-type.label: Down Time
channel-type.description: The time the mower has been disconnected from the cloud

channel-type.label: Number of Charging Cycles
channel-type.description: Number of charging cycles

channel-type.label: Number of Collisions
channel-type.description: The total number of collisions

channel-type.label: Total Charging Time
channel-type.description: Total charging time

channel-type.label: Total Cutting Time
channel-type.description: Total cutting time

channel-type.label: Relative Total Cutting Time
channel-type.description: Total cutting time in percent

channel-type.label: Total Drive Distance
channel-type.description: Total driven distance

channel-type.label: Total Running Time
channel-type.description: The total running time (the wheel motors have been running)

channel-type.label: Total Searching Time
channel-type.description: The total searching time

channel-type.label: Relative Total Searching Time
channel-type.description: The total searching time in percent

channel-type.label: Up Time
channel-type.description: The time the mower has been connected to the cloud

channel-type.label: Last GPS Position
channel-type.description: Last GPS position of the mower

channel-type.label: GPS Position
channel-type.description: A waypoint of the mower's activity

channel-type.label: Start Time
channel-type.description: Start time relative to midnight

channel-type.label: Duration
channel-type.description: Duration time

channel-type.label: Enabled on Mondays
channel-type.description: Enabled on Mondays

channel-type.label: Enabled on Tuesdays
channel-type.description: Enabled on Tuesdays

channel-type.label: Enabled on Wednesdays
channel-type.description: Enabled on Wednesdays

channel-type.label: Enabled on Thursdays
channel-type.description: Enabled on Thursdays

channel-type.label: Enabled on Fridays
channel-type.description: Enabled on Fridays

channel-type.label: Enabled on Saturdays
channel-type.description: Enabled on Saturdays

channel-type.label: Enabled on Sundays
channel-type.description: Enabled on Sundays

channel-type.label: Work Area Id of Calendar
channel-type.description: Work Area Id mapped to this calendar

channel-type.label: Stayout Zones Dirty Flag
channel-type.description: If the stay-out zones are synchronized with the Husqvarna cloud. If the map is dirty you can not enable or disable a stay-out zone.

channel-type.label: Stayout Zone Id
channel-type.description: Id of the Stayout zone

channel-type.label: Stayout Zone Name
channel-type.description: The name of the Stayout zone

channel-type.label: Stayout Zone Enabled
channel-type.description: If the Stayout zone is enabled, the Automower® will not access the zone

channel-type.label: Work Area Id
channel-type.description: Id of the Work Area

channel-type.label: Work Area Name
channel-type.description: Name of the work area

channel-type.label: Cutting Height
channel-type.description: Cutting height of the work area, range: 0-100

channel-type.label: Work Area Enabled
channel-type.description: If the work area is enabled or disabled

channel-type.label: Work Area Progress
channel-type.description: The progress on a work area. EPOS mowers and systematic mowing work areas only.

channel-type.label: Last Time Completed
channel-type.description: Timestamp when the work area was last completed. EPOS mowers and systematic mowing work areas only.

channel-type.label: Timestamp
channel-type.description: Timestamp when the event occurred

channel-type.label: Code
channel-type.description: (Error) code of the event

channel-type.label: Message
channel-type.description: The Message

channel-type.label: Severity
channel-type.description: The severity of the event

channel-type.label: GPS Position
channel-type.description: GPS Position of the event (if available)

channel-type.label: Start with Duration
channel-type.description: Start for a duration in minutes

channel-type.label: Resume Schedule
channel-type.description: Resume schedule

channel-type.label: Pause
channel-type.description: Pause the mower now until manual resume

channel-type.label: Park with Duration
channel-type.description: Park for a duration in minutes

channel-type.label: Park Until Next Schedule
channel-type.description: Park until next schedule

channel-type.label: Park and Pause the Schedule
channel-type.description: Park and pause the mower schedule until manual resume
